name: Peasant Royale
description:
Peasant Royale is what all fans of the battle royale genre have been waiting for for so long.
Medieval battle royale with up to 50 players on one huge map.

  • More than a hundred items.
  • Smooth and realistic melee combat.
  • Exciting ranged combat.
  • Resource management.

Peasant Royale masterfully combines both ranged and melee combat systems.

Early in the game, while players are not yet heavily armored, use a variety of throwing weapons
in order to survive.

]


Then, approaching the later stage of the game, having acquired a set of armor, shields, and melee weapons, enter into exciting duels
with other players and finally become the last one standing!
